TEXT.French: Retrait des Défenseurs

TEXT.English: Allows Defending Units to Withdraw from Combat if there is room to retreat backwards, and they have withdraw capabilities
TEXT.French: Permet aux défenseurs de se retirer du combat s'il y a de la place pour se retire derrière, et qu'ils possèdent des capacités de retrait
TEXT.German: Erlaubt es verteidigenden Einheiten, sich vom Kampf zurückzuziehen, wenn dafür Platz vorhanden ist und sie die grundsätzliche Fähigkeit haben
TEXT.Italian: Allows Defending Units to Withdraw from Combat if there is room to retreat backwards, and they have withdraw capabilities
TEXT.Spanish: Allows Defending Units to Withdraw from Combat if there is room to retreat backwards, and they have withdraw capabilities
TEXT.Finnish: Allows Defending Units to Withdraw from Combat if there is room to retreat backwards, and they have withdraw capabilities

TEXT.French: Nb. d'Unités Max pas Case

TEXT.English: Can force a maximum amount of units per tile. 0 indicates no maximum. Not recommended for normal gameplay.
TEXT.French: Peut forcer un nombre maximum d'unité par Case. 0 signifie pas de maximum. non recommendé pour un 'gameplay' normal.
TEXT.German: Kann eine Maximalzahl an Einheiten pro Geländefeld erzwingen. "0" bedeutet keine Begrenzung. Für normale Spiele nicht empfohlen.
TEXT.Italian: Can force a maximum amount of units per tile. 0 indicates no maximum. Not recommended for normal gameplay.
TEXT.Spanish: Can force a maximum amount of units per tile. 0 indicates no maximum. Not recommended for normal gameplay.
TEXT.Finnish: Can force a maximum amount of units per tile. 0 indicates no maximum. Not recommended for normal gameplay.

TEXT.French: Difficulté Flexible:
Gestion de la Ville :
Gestion de l'Empire:
Paramètres du Jeu:
Nb. de Tours

TEXT.English: How often the game checks your difficulty level and adjusts it. Requires Flexible Difficulty to be enabled.
TEXT.French: Détermine la fréquence à laquelle le jeu vérifie le niveau de difficulté et l'ajuste. l'option Difficulté Flexible doit être activée.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wie oft das Spiel Deinen Schwierigkeitsgrad überprüft und anpasst. Flexibler Schwierigkeitsgrad muss aktiviert sein.
TEXT.Italian: How often the game checks your difficulty level and adjusts it. Requires Flexible Difficulty to be enabled.
TEXT.Spanish: How often the game checks your difficulty level and adjusts it. Requires Flexible Difficulty to be enabled.
TEXT.Finnish: How often the game checks your difficulty level and adjusts it. Requires Flexible Difficulty to be enabled.

TEXT.French: Défense Max. contre les Bombardements

TEXT.English: The Maximum Bombard Defense a City may have. 100% may cause cities to become unsiegable. 75% is recommended
TEXT.French: La Valeur maximale de Défense contre les Bombardements qu'une Ville peut avoir. 100% rend les Ville imprenables. 75% est recommandé
TEXT.German: Die maximale Verteidigungsstärke, die eine Stadt gegenüber Bombardierung haben kann. Bei 100% können Städte nicht mehr belagert werden, 75% sind empfohlen
TEXT.Italian: The Maximum Bombard Defense a City may have. 100% may cause cities to become unsiegable. 75% is recommended
TEXT.Spanish: The Maximum Bombard Defense a City may have. 100% may cause cities to become unsiegable. 75% is recommended
TEXT.Finnish: The Maximum Bombard Defense a City may have. 100% may cause cities to become unsiegable. 75% is recommended

TEXT.French: Ne peut Réclamer les Cases d'eau

TEXT.English: With Fixed Borders, units will be unable to claim water tiles
TEXT.French: Avec Frontières Fixes, les Unités seront incapables de réclamer les case d'eau
TEXT.German: Bei "fixierten Grenzen" können keine Wasserfelder durch Militäreinheiten übernommen werden.
TEXT.Italian: With Fixed Borders, units will be unable to claim water tiles
TEXT.Spanish: With Fixed Borders, units will be unable to claim water tiles
TEXT.Finnish: With Fixed Borders, units will be unable to claim water tiles

TEXT.French: Voir les Traits des Civilisations

TEXT.English: Shows your civilization's traits on the flag, when hovering over it. Recommended only for larger resolutions.
TEXT.French: Affiche les Traits de votre Civilisation en infobulle sur le Drapeau. Recommandé uniquement pour les plus hautes résolutions.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Merkmale Deiner Zivilisation als Tooltip über Deiner Flagge. Nur für höhere Bildschirmauflösungen empfohlen..
TEXT.Italian: Shows your civilization's traits on the flag, when hovering over it. Recommended only for larger resolutions.
TEXT.Spanish: Shows your civilization's traits on the flag, when hovering over it. Recommended only for larger resolutions.
TEXT.Finnish: Shows your civilization's traits on the flag, when hovering over it. Recommended only for larger resolutions.

TEXT.French: Pas de Pillage des équipiers

TEXT.English: Units will be unable to pillage improvements owned by you or one of your team members
TEXT.French: Les Unités seront incapables de piller vos propres aménagements ou ceux des membres de votre équipe
TEXT.German: Einheiten können keine Verbesserungen plündern, die entweder Dir oder Deinem Team gehören
TEXT.Italian: Units will be unable to pillage improvements owned by you or one of your team members
TEXT.Spanish: Units will be unable to pillage improvements owned by you or one of your team members
TEXT.Finnish: Units will be unable to pillage improvements owned by you or one of your team members

TEXT.French: Difficulté Flexible

TEXT.English: Enables/Disables the Flexible Difficulty Game Option
TEXT.French: Active/Désactive l'option de Jeu 'Difficulté Flexible'
TEXT.Italian: Enables/Disables the Flexible Difficulty Game Option
TEXT.Spanish: Enables/Disables the Flexible Difficulty Game Option
TEXT.Finnish: Enables/Disables the Flexible Difficulty Game Option

TEXT.French: Difficulté Minimum

TEXT.English: The minimum difficulty that you can fall to when playing with Flexible Difficulty
TEXT.French: La difficulté minimum à laquelle vous pouvez tomber avec l'Option Difficulté Flexible
TEXT.German: Der minimale Schwierigkeitsgrad, auf die Du bei flexiblem Schwierigkeitsgrad fallen kannst
TEXT.Italian: The minimum difficulty that you can fall to when playing with Flexible Difficulty
TEXT.Spanish: The minimum difficulty that you can fall to when playing with Flexible Difficulty
TEXT.Finnish: The minimum difficulty that you can fall to when playing with Flexible Difficulty

TEXT.French: Pas de Minimum|Colon|Chef|Seigneur|Régent|Prince|Monarque|Empereur|Immortel|Divinité
Difficulté Maximum

TEXT.English: The maximum difficulty that you can be raised to when playing with Flexible Difficulty
TEXT.French: La difficulté maximum que vous pouvez atteindre avec l'Option Difficulté Flexible
TEXT.German: Der maximale Schwierigkeitsgrad, auf den Du bei "flexiblem Schwierigkeitsgrad" gehoben werden kannst
TEXT.Italian: The maximum difficulty that you can be raised to when playing with Flexible Difficulty
TEXT.Spanish: The maximum difficulty that you can be raised to when playing with Flexible Difficulty
TEXT.Finnish: The maximum difficulty that you can be raised to when playing with Flexible Difficulty

TEXT.French: Pas de Maximum|Colon|Chef|Seigneur|Régent|Prince|Monarque|Empereur|Immortel|Divinité
Rang Maximum

TEXT.English: Your difficulty will not change if your rank is above the maximum rank. -1 indicates no maximum rank.
TEXT.French: Votre difficulté ne va pas changer si votre rang est supérieur au Rang Maximum. -1 signifie pas de rang maximum.
TEXT.German: Der Schwierigkeitsgrad wird sich nicht ändern, solange er über dem maximalem Rang liegt. -1 bedeutet kein maximaler Rang.
TEXT.Italian: Your difficulty will not change if your rank is above the maximum rank. -1 Indicates no maximum rank.
TEXT.Spanish: Your difficulty will not change if your rank is above the maximum rank. -1 Indicates no maximum rank.
TEXT.Finnish: Your difficulty will not change if your rank is above the maximum rank. -1 Indicates no maximum rank.

TEXT.French: Rang Minimum

TEXT.English: Your difficulty will not change if your rank is below the minimum rank. -1 indicates no minimum rank.
TEXT.French: Votre difficulté ne va pas changer si votre rang est inférieur au Rang Minimum. -1 signifie pas de rang minimum.
TEXT.German: Der Schwierigkeitsgrad wird sich nicht ändern, solange er unter dem minimalem Rang liegt. -1 bedeutet kein minimaler Rang.
TEXT.Italian: Your difficulty will not change if your rank is below the minimum rank. -1 Indicates no minimum rank.
TEXT.Spanish: Your difficulty will not change if your rank is below the minimum rank. -1 Indicates no minimum rank.
TEXT.Finnish: Your difficulty will not change if your rank is below the minimum rank. -1 Indicates no minimum rank.

TEXT.French: Voir les Bâtiments Côtiers

TEXT.English: Shows coastal buildings in the city queue when they are hidden because of coastal or river prerequisites
TEXT.French: Affiche les Bâtiments côtiers dans la Liste de production lorsqu'il sont cachés en raison des pré-requis (côtes ou rivière)
TEXT.German: Zeigt Gebäude in der Liste der Stadtansicht, die normalerweise nicht angezeigt werden, da sie Küsten- oder Flusslage erfordern
TEXT.Italian: Shows coastal buildings in the city queue when they are hidden because of coastal or river prerequisites
TEXT.Spanish: Shows coastal buildings in the city queue when they are hidden because of coastal or river prerequisites
TEXT.Finnish: Shows coastal buildings in the city queue when they are hidden because of coastal or river prerequisites

TEXT.French: Masquer les Bâtiments Obsolètes

TEXT.English: Hides Obsolete Buildings from the main city screen.
TEXT.French: Masque les Bâtiments Obsolètes de l'Ecran principal de la Ville.
TEXT.German: Verbirgt veraltete Gebäude in der Stadtansicht.
TEXT.Italian: Hides Obsolete Buildings from the main city screen.
TEXT.Spanish: Hides Obsolete Buildings from the main city screen.
TEXT.Finnish: Hides Obsolete Buildings from the main city screen.

TEXT.French: Epuisement des Ressources

TEXT.English: Allows non-renewable resources to naturally deplete, based on the level of consumption
TEXT.French: Permet aux ressources non-renouvelables de s'épuiser naturellement, basé sur le niveau de consommation
TEXT.German: Nicht erneuerbare Ressourcen können sich je nach dem Grad der Konsumierung aufbrauchen (z.B. erschöpfte Minen).
TEXT.Italian: Allows non-renewable resources to naturally deplete, based on the level of consumption
TEXT.Spanish: Allows non-renewable resources to naturally deplete, based on the level of consumption
TEXT.Finnish: Allows non-renewable resources to naturally deplete, based on the level of consumption

TEXT.French: Interception Aérienne améliorée

TEXT.English: Changes Air Interception to be Multiplicitive, making it more useful to have more than one air defender for each city.
TEXT.French: Modifie l'Interception aérienne et la rend Multiplicative, rendant le fait d'avoir plus d'une unité de défense aérienne dans chaque Ville plus utile.
TEXT.German: Das Abfangen von Flugzeugen ist multiplikativ, somit ist es effektiver, mehr als eine Flugabwehreinheit pro Stadt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: Changes Air Interception to be Multiplicitive, making it more useful to have more than one air defender for each city.
TEXT.Spanish: Changes Air Interception to be Multiplicitive, making it more useful to have more than one air defender for each city.
TEXT.Finnish: Changes Air Interception to be Multiplicitive, making it more useful to have more than one air defender for each city.

TEXT.French: Portée de la Réaffectation

TEXT.English: The maximum range aircraft can be rebased in one turn. After supersonic flight, aircraft get unlimited rebase range. 0 indicates unlimited range.
TEXT.French: La portée maximum qu'un avion peut atteindre lorsqu'il change de base en un tour (Réaffectation). Après le Vol supersonique, les avions ont une portée illimitée. 0 signifie portée illimitée.
TEXT.German: Die maximale Reichweite für Stellungswechsel von Luftfahrzeugen. Ab Überschallflug ist die Reichweite unbegrenzt. 0 bedeutet unbegrenzte Reichweite.
TEXT.Italian: The maximum range aircraft can be rebased in one turn. After supersonic flight, aircraft get unlimited rebase range. 0 indicates unlimited range.
TEXT.Spanish: The maximum range aircraft can be rebased in one turn. After supersonic flight, aircraft get unlimited rebase range. 0 indicates unlimited range.
TEXT.Finnish: The maximum range aircraft can be rebased in one turn. After supersonic flight, aircraft get unlimited rebase range. 0 indicates unlimited range.

TEXT.French: Règle de Grâce

TEXT.English: If one player's score is greater than half of the score of all the other players scores combined, a 10 turn countdown until victory occurs.
TEXT.French: Si le score d'un joueur est plus grand que la moitié de la somme des scores de tous les autres joueurs, un compteur de 10 tours est lancé, avant la victoire.
TEXT.German: Wenn die Punktzahl eines Spielers größer als das Doppelte der Summe der Punkte aller anderen Spieler ist, so beginnt ein Countdown von 10 Runden, nach dem der Spieler gewinnt.
TEXT.Italian: If one player's score is greater than half of the score of all the other players scores combined, a 10 turn countdown until victory occurs.
TEXT.Spanish: If one player's score is greater than half of the score of all the other players scores combined, a 10 turn countdown until victory occurs.
TEXT.Finnish: If one player's score is greater than half of the score of all the other players scores combined, a 10 turn countdown until victory occurs.

TEXT.French: Diplomatie Réaliste

TEXT.English: Realisitic Diplomacy decreases the amount of time it takes for the AI to forget past transgressions, and removes the AI favoritism bias that many leaders have.
TEXT.French: Supprime l'attirance non justifiée que les IAs ont envers les autres IAs.
TEXT.German: Entfernt die unfaire Bevorzugung von KIs voneinander.
TEXT.Italian: Realisitic Diplomacy decreases the amount of time it takes for the AI to forget past transgressions, and removes the AI favoritism bias that many leaders have.
TEXT.Spanish: Realisitic Diplomacy decreases the amount of time it takes for the AI to forget past transgressions, and removes the AI favoritism bias that many leaders have.
TEXT.Finnish: Realisitic Diplomacy decreases the amount of time it takes for the AI to forget past transgressions, and removes the AI favoritism bias that many leaders have.

TEXT.French: Pas d'Echange Militaire

TEXT.English: Removes the ability to trade military units. Only takes affect if Advanced Diplomacy is enabled.
TEXT.French: Enlève la possibilité d'échanger des unités militaires. N'a d'effet que si l'Option Diplomatie Avancée est activée.
TEXT.German: Entfernt die Möglichkeit, Militäreinheiten zu handeln. Nur bei "fortgeschrittener Diplomatie".
TEXT.Italian: Removes the ability to trade military units. Only takes affect if Advanced Diplomacy is enabled.
TEXT.Spanish: Removes the ability to trade military units. Only takes affect if Advanced Diplomacy is enabled.
TEXT.Finnish: Removes the ability to trade military units. Only takes affect if Advanced Diplomacy is enabled.

TEXT.French: Masquer les Bâtiments non-Constructibles

TEXT.English: Hides all buildings from the city queue that cannot be constructed.
TEXT.French: Masque tous les bâtiments qui ne peuvent pas être construits de la liste de production.
TEXT.German: Verbirgt alle Gebäude von der Produktionsliste der Stadt, die nicht errichtet werden können.
TEXT.Italian: Hides all buildings from the city queue that cannot be constructed.
TEXT.Spanish: Hides all buildings from the city queue that cannot be constructed.
TEXT.Finnish: Hides all buildings from the city queue that cannot be constructed.

TEXT.French: Masquer les Unités non-Constructibles

TEXT.English: Hides all units from the city queue that cannot be constructed
TEXT.French: Masque toutes les unités qui ne peuvent pas être construites de la liste de production.
TEXT.German: Verbirgt alle Einheiten von der Produktionsliste der Stadt, die nicht ausgebildet werden können.
TEXT.Italian: Hides all units from the city queue that cannot be constructed
TEXT.Spanish: Hides all units from the city queue that cannot be constructed
TEXT.Finnish: Hides all units from the city queue that cannot be constructed

TEXT.French: Voir les Valeurs Détaillées de RevIndex

TEXT.English: Shows detailed RevIndex values for civics. If disabled, generic descriptions will be used instead.
TEXT.French: Affiche les valeurs détaillées de RevIndex. Si désactivé, les descriptions générales seront utilisées à la place.
TEXT.German: Zeigt detaillierte RevIndex-Werte bei Staatsformen. Bei deaktivierter Funktion werden die Standardbeschreibungen verwendet.
TEXT.Italian: Shows detailed RevIndex values for civics. If disabled, generic descriptions will be used instead.
TEXT.Spanish: Shows detailed RevIndex values for civics. If disabled, generic descriptions will be used instead.
TEXT.Finnish: Shows detailed RevIndex values for civics. If disabled, generic descriptions will be used instead.

TEXT.French: Reset de tous les paramètres

TEXT.English: Reset All A New Dawn Settings to their Default Values.
TEXT.French: Reset tous les Paramètres de 'A New Dawn' à leurs valeurs par défaut.
TEXT.German: Alle "A New Dawn"-Einstellungen werden auf Standard zurückgesetzt.
TEXT.Italian: Reset All A New Dawn Settings to their Default Values.
TEXT.Spanish: Reset All A New Dawn Settings to their Default Values.
TEXT.Finnish: Reset All A New Dawn Settings to their Default Values.

TEXT.French: Promotions sur le Champ de Bataille

TEXT.English: Units that preform particularly well in combat may earn a promotion in the midst of battle instead of XP.
TEXT.French: Les Unités qui se distinguent particulièrement au combat peuvent obtenir des promotions pendant le combat, à la place de l'EXP.
TEXT.German: Einheiten, die besonders erfolgreich kämpfen, können direkt in der Schlacht eine Beförderung erhalten (statt Erfahrungspunkten).
TEXT.Italian: Units that preform particularly well in combat may earn a promotion in the midst of battle instead of XP.
TEXT.Spanish: Units that preform particularly well in combat may earn a promotion in the midst of battle instead of XP.
TEXT.Finnish: Units that preform particularly well in combat may earn a promotion in the midst of battle instead of XP.

TEXT.French: Masquer les Bâtiments Remplacés

TEXT.English: Hides any buildings from the city contruct queue if their upgraded form can be built immediately. (e.g The harbor will be hidden if the Port is available).
TEXT.French: Masque tous les bâtiments de la liste de production si la version améliorée de ces bâtiments est déjà disponible (example : sera masqué si le Port est disponible).
TEXT.German: Verbirgt Gebäude auf der Produktionsliste, sobald eine verbesserte Version errichtet werden kann (z.B. wird der Hafen verborgen, wenn der Handelshafen verfügbar ist).
TEXT.Italian: Hides any buildings from the city contruct queue if their upgraded form can be built immediately. (e.g The harbor will be hidden if the Port is available).
TEXT.Spanish: Hides any buildings from the city contruct queue if their upgraded form can be built immediately. (e.g The harbor will be hidden if the Port is available).
TEXT.Finnish: Hides any buildings from the city contruct queue if their upgraded form can be built immediately. (e.g The harbor will be hidden if the Port is available).

TEXT.French: Pas de Tempêtes

TEXT.English: Storms will stop spawning, and dissipate over time.
TEXT.French: Les Tempêtes vont arrêter d'apparaître, et se dissipent avec le temps.
TEXT.German: Es werden keine neuen Stürme entstehen und bereits vorhandene lösen sich langsam auf.
TEXT.Italian: Storms will stop spawning, and dissipate over time.
TEXT.Spanish: Storms will stop spawning, and dissipate over time.
TEXT.Finnish: Storms will stop spawning, and dissipate over time.

TEXT.French: Couleur du Joueur

TEXT.English: Changes the color of your civilization
TEXT.French: Change la Couleur de votre Civilisation
TEXT.Italian: Changes the color of your civilization
TEXT.Spanish: Changes the color of your civilization
TEXT.Finnish: Changes the color of your civilization

TEXT.English: Current Color|Black|Blue|Brown|Cyan|Dark Blue|Dark Cyan|Dark Green|Dark Pink|Dark Purple|Dark Red|Dark Yellow|Grey|Green|Orange|Peach|Pink|Purple|Red|White|Yellow|Light Green|Light Blue|Light Yellow|Light Purple|Light Orange|Golden Purple|Dark Grey|Cyan Green|Dark Lemon|Navy Blue|Maroon|Light Brown|Dark Orange|Forest Green|Dark Indigo|Red - Gold|Gold - Black|Green - Black
TEXT.French: Couleur actuelle|Noir|Bleu|Brun|Cyan|Bleu foncé|Cyan foncé|Vert foncé|Rose foncé|Violet foncé|Rouge foncé|Jaune foncé|Gris|Vert|Orange|Pêche|Rose|Violet|Rouge|Blanc|Jaune|Vert Clair|Bleu Clair|Jaune Clair|Violet Clair|Orange Clair|Pourpre doré|Gris foncé|Bleu-Vert|Citron-Foncé|Bleu Marine|Marron|Brun clair|Orange foncé|Vert Forêt|Indigo foncé|Rouge - Or|Or - Noir|Vert - Noir
TEXT.Italian: Current Color|Black|Blue|Brown|Cyan|Dark Blue|Dark Cyan|Dark Green|Dark Pink|Dark Purple|Dark Red|Dark Yellow|Grey|Green|Orange|Peach|Pink|Purple|Red|White|Yellow|Light Green|Light Blue|Light Yellow|Light Purple|Light Orange|Golden Purple|Dark Grey|Cyan Green|Dark Lemon|Navy Blue|Maroon|Light Brown|Dark Orange|Forest Green|Dark Indigo|Red - Gold|Gold - Black|Green - Black
TEXT.Spanish: Current Color|Black|Blue|Brown|Cyan|Dark Blue|Dark Cyan|Dark Green|Dark Pink|Dark Purple|Dark Red|Dark Yellow|Grey|Green|Orange|Peach|Pink|Purple|Red|White|Yellow|Light Green|Light Blue|Light Yellow|Light Purple|Light Orange|Golden Purple|Dark Grey|Cyan Green|Dark Lemon|Navy Blue|Maroon|Light Brown|Dark Orange|Forest Green|Dark Indigo|Red - Gold|Gold - Black|Green - Black
TEXT.Finnish: Current Color|Black|Blue|Brown|Cyan|Dark Blue|Dark Cyan|Dark Green|Dark Pink|Dark Purple|Dark Red|Dark Yellow|Grey|Green|Orange|Peach|Pink|Purple|Red|White|Yellow|Light Green|Light Blue|Light Yellow|Light Purple|Light Orange|Golden Purple|Dark Grey|Cyan Green|Dark Lemon|Navy Blue|Maroon|Light Brown|Dark Orange|Forest Green|Dark Indigo|Red - Gold|Gold - Black|Green - Black

TEXT.French: EXP amélioré

TEXT.English: XP Gains based on how units fought in battle. The harder the battle, the more XP will be earned.
TEXT.French: Les Gains d'EXP basés sur la manière dont l'unité se bat au combat. Plus la bataille est difficile, plus d'EXP est obtenu.
TEXT.German: Die Erfahrungspunkte (XP) basieren darauf, wie erfolgreich die Einheiten in der Schlacht kämpften. Je härter die Schlacht, umso mehr Erfahrungspunkte kommen hinzu.
TEXT.Italian: XP Gains based on how units fought in battle. The harder the battle, the more XP will be earned.
TEXT.Spanish: XP Gains based on how units fought in battle. The harder the battle, the more XP will be earned.
TEXT.Finnish: XP Gains based on how units fought in battle. The harder the battle, the more XP will be earned.

TEXT.French: Avertissement sonore d'attente

TEXT.English: The game will play an alert sound when the game is waiting for you to finish your turn before the next turn can proceed.
TEXT.French: Le Jeu émettra un avertissement sonore lorsque le tour nécessite encore une intevention de la part du Joueur avant de pouvoir passer au tour suivant.
TEXT.German: Das Spiel spielt einen Warnton ab, wenn es darauf wartet, dass Du die Runde beendest, um die nächste Runde beginnen zu können.
TEXT.Italian: The game will play an alert sound when the game is waiting for you to finish your turn before the next turn can proceed.
TEXT.Spanish: The game will play an alert sound when the game is waiting for you to finish your turn before the next turn can proceed.
TEXT.Finnish: The game will play an alert sound when the game is waiting for you to finish your turn before the next turn can proceed.

TEXT.French: Temps entre chaque Notification d'Avertissement sonore

TEXT.English: Sets the time inbetween the next alert notification sound effect, in seconds.
TEXT.French: Définit le temps entre deux avertissements sonore d'attente, en secondes.
TEXT.German: Legt die Zeit zwischen 2 Alarmsignalen in Sekunden fest.
TEXT.Italian: Sets the time inbetween the next alert notification sound effect, in seconds.
TEXT.Spanish: Sets the time inbetween the next alert notification sound effect, in seconds.
TEXT.Finnish: Sets the time inbetween the next alert notification sound effect, in seconds.

TEXT.French: Difficulté actuelle
Change votre paramètre de difficulté
Difficulté actuelle|Colon|Chef|Seigneur|Régent|Prince|Monarque|Empereur|Immortel|Divinité
Masquer les Actions non disponibles des Ouvriers

TEXT.English: Worker Builds that can not be preformed will be hidden from the action bar.
TEXT.French: Les Aménagements que les Ouvriers ne peuvent pas préparer sont masquées de la barre d'action.
TEXT.German: Worker Builds that can not be preformed will be hidden from the action bar.
TEXT.Italian: Worker Builds that can not be preformed will be hidden from the action bar.
TEXT.Spanish: Worker Builds that can not be preformed will be hidden from the action bar.
TEXT.Finnish: Worker Builds that can not be preformed will be hidden from the action bar.

TEXT.French: Masquer les Actions obsolètes des Ouvriers

TEXT.English: Worker Builds that are obsolete (e.g cart path when roads are available) will be hidden.
TEXT.French: Les Aménagements obsolètes (par ex : le chemin lorsques les routes sont disponibles) sont masquées de la barre d'action.
TEXT.German: Worker Builds that are obsolete (e.g cart path when roads are available) will be hidden.
TEXT.Italian: Worker Builds that are obsolete (e.g cart path when roads are available) will be hidden.
TEXT.Spanish: Worker Builds that are obsolete (e.g cart path when roads are available) will be hidden.
TEXT.Finnish: Worker Builds that are obsolete (e.g cart path when roads are available) will be hidden.

TEXT.French: Prise de Guerre

TEXT.English: When enemy ships are attacked, there is a chance that they will be captured instead of being sunk. If the ship that is captured is a transport, there is also a chance gold will be recovered from the enemy ship.
TEXT.French: Lorsque les bateaux ennemis sont attaqués, il y a une probabilité qu'ils soient capturés plutôt que d'être coulés. Si le navire capturé est un transporteur, Il y a une probabilité qu'un butin en or soit également récupéré.
TEXT.German: When enemy ships are attacked, there is a chance that they will be captured instead of being sunk. If the ship that is captured is a transport, there is also a chance gold will be recovered from the enemy ship.
TEXT.Italian: When enemy ships are attacked, there is a chance that they will be captured instead of being sunk. If the ship that is captured is a transport, there is also a chance gold will be recovered from the enemy ship.
TEXT.Spanish: When enemy ships are attacked, there is a chance that they will be captured instead of being sunk. If the ship that is captured is a transport, there is also a chance gold will be recovered from the enemy ship.
TEXT.Finnish: When enemy ships are attacked, there is a chance that they will be captured instead of being sunk. If the ship that is captured is a transport, there is also a chance gold will be recovered from the enemy ship.

TEXT.French: Nom des Villes d'après les repères de terrain

TEXT.English: Cities will be named after nearby landmarks, instead of using the standard list of names. If no landmark is nearby, a standard name is used.
TEXT.French: Les Noms des Villes proposés correspondront à des repères de terrains aux alentours, à la place de la liste standard de la civ. S'il n'y a pas de repère à proximité, un nom standard est proposé.
TEXT.German: Cities will be named after nearby landmarks, instead of using the standard list of names. If no landmark is nearby, a standard name is used.
TEXT.Italian: Cities will be named after nearby landmarks, instead of using the standard list of names. If no landmark is nearby, a standard name is used.
TEXT.Spanish: Cities will be named after nearby landmarks, instead of using the standard list of names. If no landmark is nearby, a standard name is used.
TEXT.Finnish: Cities will be named after nearby landmarks, instead of using the standard list of names. If no landmark is nearby, a standard name is used.

TEXT.French: Images d'Evénements

TEXT.English: Random Events will display an image with them.
TEXT.French: Les Evénements aléatoires sont affichés avec une image.
TEXT.German: Random Events will display an image with them.
TEXT.Italian: Random Events will display an image with them.
TEXT.Spanish: Random Events will display an image with them.
TEXT.Finnish: Random Events will display an image with them.

TEXT.French: Ignorer les Avertissements concernant les bâtiments obsolètes

TEXT.English: When resources, civics, or other factors cause a building to be disabled in one of your cities, you will not recieve a notification of the event.
TEXT.French: When resources, civics, or other factors cause a building to be disabled in one of your cities, you will not recieve a notification of the event.
TEXT.German: When resources, civics, or other factors cause a building to be disabled in one of your cities, you will not recieve a notification of the event.
TEXT.Italian: When resources, civics, or other factors cause a building to be disabled in one of your cities, you will not recieve a notification of the event.
TEXT.Spanish: When resources, civics, or other factors cause a building to be disabled in one of your cities, you will not recieve a notification of the event.
TEXT.Finnish: When resources, civics, or other factors cause a building to be disabled in one of your cities, you will not recieve a notification of the event.

TEXT.French: Propagation Multiple des Religions

TEXT.English: Allows religions to spread naturally, even when cities already have one religion in them.
TEXT.French: Allows religions to spread naturally, even when cities already have one religion in them.
TEXT.German: Allows religions to spread naturally, even when cities already have one religion in them.
TEXT.Italian: Allows religions to spread naturally, even when cities already have one religion in them.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows religions to spread naturally, even when cities already have one religion in them.
TEXT.Finnish: Allows religions to spread naturally, even when cities already have one religion in them.

TEXT.French: Dommages de Terrain

TEXT.English: Certain terrain, like deserts, will cause damage to units as they cross them.
TEXT.French: Certains terrains, comme les déserts, vont endommager les unités qui les traversent.
TEXT.German: Certain terrain, like deserts, will cause damage to units as they cross them.
TEXT.Italian: Certain terrain, like deserts, will cause damage to units as they cross them.
TEXT.Spanish: Certain terrain, like deserts, will cause damage to units as they cross them.
TEXT.Finnish: Certain terrain, like deserts, will cause damage to units as they cross them.

TEXT.French: Evénements Stratégiques

TEXT.English: Strategic Events are random events that force players to make decisions that are strategically important, and could alter the course of the game. They can be more negative than standard events, but also more positive.
TEXT.French: Les Evénements stratéqiues sont des événements aléatoires qui obligent les joueurs à prendre des décisions importantes au niveau stratégique, et qui peuvent changer le cours du Jeu. Ces événements ont beaucoup plus d'incidence, en bien ou en mal.
TEXT.German: Strategic Events are random events that force players to make decisions that are strategically important, and could alter the course of the game. They can be more negative than standard events, but also more positive.
TEXT.Italian: Strategic Events are random events that force players to make decisions that are strategically important, and could alter the course of the game. They can be more negative than standard events, but also more positive.
TEXT.Spanish: Strategic Events are random events that force players to make decisions that are strategically important, and could alter the course of the game. They can be more negative than standard events, but also more positive.
TEXT.Finnish: Strategic Events are random events that force players to make decisions that are strategically important, and could alter the course of the game. They can be more negative than standard events, but also more positive.

TEXT.French: Terraformation

TEXT.English: Allows late game workers to terraform barran land into more habitable areas.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, permet aux Ouvriers et Ingénieurs de transformer des terres inhabitables en zones plus clémentes.
TEXT.German: Allows late game workers to terraform barran land into more habitable areas.
TEXT.Italian: Allows late game workers to terraform barran land into more habitable areas.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows late game workers to terraform barran land into more habitable areas.
TEXT.Finnish: Allows late game workers to terraform barran land into more habitable areas.

TEXT.French: Reforestation

TEXT.English: Allows late game workers to replant depleted forests and jungles.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, donne la possibilité aux Ouvriers de replanter des forêts et de la jungle.
TEXT.German: Allows late game workers to replant depleted forests and jungles.
TEXT.Italian: Allows late game workers to replant depleted forests and jungles.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows late game workers to replant depleted forests and jungles.
TEXT.Finnish: Allows late game workers to replant depleted forests and jungles.

TEXT.French: Tunnels aquatiques

TEXT.English: Allows the construction of sea tunnels after the player has researched Civil Engineering. Sea tunnels allow troops to move across water unaided by any transports.
TEXT.French: Lorsque activé, Permet la construction de tunnels aquatiques après la découverte de l'Ingénierie Civile. Ces tunnesl permettent aux troupes terrestres de se déplacer à travers l'eau sans avoir à utiliser de transports.
TEXT.German: Allows the construction of sea tunnels after the player has researched Civil Engineering. Sea tunnels allow troops to move across water unaided by any transports.
TEXT.Italian: Allows the construction of sea tunnels after the player has researched Civil Engineering. Sea tunnels allow troops to move across water unaided by any transports.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows the construction of sea tunnels after the player has researched Civil Engineering. Sea tunnels allow troops to move across water unaided by any transports.
TEXT.Finnish: Allows the construction of sea tunnels after the player has researched Civil Engineering. Sea tunnels allow troops to move across water unaided by any transports.

TEXT.French: Pas de Fondation Auto des Corporations

TEXT.English: Corporations will not be auto-founded by the game, and must be founded by normal means.
TEXT.French: Les Corporations ne seront pas fondées automatiquement par le jeu, et doivent être tout d'abord fondées en construisant leur siège.
TEXT.German: Corporations will not be auto-founded by the game, and must be founded by normal means.
TEXT.Italian: Corporations will not be auto-founded by the game, and must be founded by normal means.
TEXT.Spanish: Corporations will not be auto-founded by the game, and must be founded by normal means.
TEXT.Finnish: Corporations will not be auto-founded by the game, and must be founded by normal means.

TEXT.French: No Production Popup

TEXT.English: Zooms the city when the production queue is empty instead of opening a popup (best combined with the minimize popups option).
TEXT.French: Zooms the city when the production queue is empty instead of opening a popup (best combined with the minimize popups option).
TEXT.German: Zooms the city when the production queue is empty instead of opening a popup (best combined with the minimize popups option).
TEXT.Italian: Zooms the city when the production queue is empty instead of opening a popup (best combined with the minimize popups option).
TEXT.Spanish: Zooms the city when the production queue is empty instead of opening a popup (best combined with the minimize popups option).
TEXT.Finnish: Zooms the city when the production queue is empty instead of opening a popup (best combined with the minimize popups option).
